title: Bug 129561HCGBIDI: Undesirable generation of SQL query elements
description: Bug 129561HCGBIDI: Undesirable generation of SQL query elements This is not even NLS specific defect. Otherwise the query will fail.1. Create table with name including blank in this database. Select 'Preview Results'. Result: Exception is fired. 7. 'Table Name'. 'Column Name'. 8.
OB: When creating a table with a name that includes a blank space and selecting 'Preview Results', an exception is fired. The result displays the table name and column name.
EB: When creating a table with a name that includes a blank space and selecting 'Preview Results', no exception should be fired. The result should not display the table name and column name.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Create a DB2 database. 2. Ensure it has a column with a name that includes a blank space. 3. Create a Data Source based on the database from step 1. 4. Create a Data Set based on the table from step 2. 5. On the Query screen, drag and drop the column name from step 2 into the select portion of the clause. 6. Manually change the SQL query as follows: select USER.
